version_description:
This update fixes the most common bugs and offers minor improvements:
- crashes when applying manual controls using Sony cameras
- restructured app settings
- improved customer support integration
We updated our app icon for a fresh, new look.

We updated the user interface to fit our new look.

If you like GoCamera, would you mind taking a moment to write a nice review on the App Store? We'd greatly appreciate it. Thanks for your support!
We are constantly working to make GoCamera better for you. This update features several performance and stability improvements.

3.8
In this version we solved a bug that could lead to occasional app crashes when taking pictures (missing photo library authorization).

3.7
We have rewritten the entire camera connection to improve connectivity and device support. We also introduced support for iPhone X with this version.

This update contains minor bugfixes and improvements.

If you like using GoCamera, please take a moment and write a review. Thank you!
